column3:
Suggested fix for the linter:

```diff
diff --git a/contrib/devtools/lint-logs.sh b/contrib/devtools/lint-logs.sh
index 3bb54359a8..35be13ec19 100755
--- a/contrib/devtools/lint-logs.sh
+++ b/contrib/devtools/lint-logs.sh
@@ -13,12 +13,13 @@
 # ignored
 
 
-UNTERMINATED_LOGS=$(git grep "LogPrintf(" -- "*.cpp" | \
+UNTERMINATED_LOGS=$(git grep --extended-regexp "LogPrintf?\(
@MarcoFalke thanks, will add that and fix the remaining cases.
